summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganCeraVe Travel Size Moisturizing Cream for balanced to dry skin with ceramides and hyaluronic acid provides 24-hour hydration for dry skin while replenishing the skin's barrier with ceramides.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the skin's barrier with three essential ceramidesRich, velvety moisturizing cream formula features hyaluronic acid to leave dry skin feeling smooth and comfortableAbsorbs quickly to soften skin without leaving a greasy or sticky feelIdeal for all skin types, including sensitive skinGentle, non-irritating formulaHypoallergenic and allergy-testedNon-comedogenicDeveloped with dermatologistsKey IngredientsCeramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrierHyaluronic acid attracts hydration to the skin's surface and helps dry skin retain moistureMVE Technology, a patented delivery system, continually releases moisturizing ingredientsFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensOilItem 2532670How To UseApply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician to face and body.Cleanse: Hydrating Facial Cleanser: Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier 2. Treat: Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum: Replenishes skin hydration while helping restore the protective skin barrier 3. Moisturize: Moisturizing Cream: Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrier 4. Protect: Hydrating 100% mineral sunscreen to reflect the sun's harmful rays plus three essential ceramides to help restore skin's natural barrierIngredientsPurified Water, Glycerin, Cetareth-20 and Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Dimethicone, Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide 1, Ceramide 3, Ceramide 6-II, Cholesterol, Phytosphingosine, Potassium Phosphate, Dipotassium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician to face and body.Cleanse: Hydrating Facial Cleanser: Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier 2. Treat: Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum: Replenishes skin hydration while helping restore the protective skin barrier 3. Moisturize: Moisturizing Cream: Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrier 4. Protect: Hydrating 100% mineral sunscreen to reflect the sun's harmful rays plus three essential ceramides to help restore skin's natural barrier

reviews.headline: MAINSTAY
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is my holy grail! Above all else I'll use this and nothing else after showering etc.

reviews.headline: This is great for elbows!
reviews.comments: I use this twice a day on my elbows and it works great! They are soft and no longer scaly.

reviews.headline: Thick and not moisturizing
reviews.comments: I found this cream to be very thick and not moisturizing at the same time. I have dry skin during the winter and thought to give this a try. It doesn't spread easily (over the body) and my skin just didn't get much moisture out of it. I will probably return to Curel during winter.

reviews.headline: the very best!
reviews.comments: I only buy this because it's like pudding and truly keeps my skin soft.

reviews.headline: A good cream
reviews.comments: [I recieved this product for my honest review] [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The moisture level of this lotion is medium.  The absorption is his high.  What I appreciate is the application happens smoothly and quick.  All it takes is one or two rubs and the cream emulsifies.  If there is no scent, which is fine.  But it definitely a moisturizing cream.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: Its so thick and hydrating but doesnt look or feel greasy. I love it so far! I have very acne prone skin and i havent noticed and breakouts. Does great on face and body

reviews.headline: Smelly
reviews.comments: I just wanted to leave a reciew and let the people who are sensitive to smells know that while this is fragrance free it is VERY smelly! It bothers me a lot until it soaks in, I would be much happier if there was no scent at all. But as a moisturizer it works well so i keep buying it but only for my dry hands never anywhere close to my face because the smell is so strong

reviews.headline: Only moisturizer I have found for my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Finding moisturizers is hellish for me. They either leave me oily and breaking out or I have to sit on the bathroom floor for ten minutes waiting for my face to stop burning. This is the only moisturizer I have ever found that doesn't produce these results. It is also very cheap - lots of bang for your buck. It washes off and absorbs into the skin well. You don't need to use much to cover the whole face - about half a teaspoon if I were to estimate. I like to put a little extra on at night to let it soak in - I have found this method hydrates my skin well and prevents my acne treatments from irritating my skin.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for years
reviews.comments: This is a great cream and recommended by dermatologists.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for my reactive skin
reviews.comments: I am on a prescribed acne cream and was hoping this would provide hydration without irritating. The level of burn I experienced putting this on my skin is hard to describe… I slept with an ice pack on my face. Needless to say- didn't work for me.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: My skin loves this!

reviews.headline: Would purchase again
reviews.comments: I've been searching for a face cream for my combination like skin that wasn't oily or left me feeling drier than I started with. This did the trick and I feel hydrated afterwards.

reviews.headline: Wow! Love it.
reviews.comments: I cant believe how much product you get for the price! This feels so luxurious. My dry skin needs it. I love using it on my face and all over my body—anywhere that needs hydration. I will definitely repurchase this!

reviews.headline: decent moisturizer
reviews.comments: works rlly food for my arms/legs and body but wouldnt really recommend for regular use on your face

reviews.headline: Rich and moisturizing
reviews.comments: This cream is so nice and rich. I use this probably 2-3 times a week to provide extra rich moisture to my skin. It makes my skin appear more visibly hydrated and it feels great. My mother who has eczema uses it daily and has noticed much more hydrated and less irritated skin.

reviews.headline: Long time user of this product
reviews.comments: A rich cream, but not too rich!

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: This product makes your skin feel really moisturized, but does leave a weird layer on your skin. It still works really well just not my favorite.

reviews.headline: Good body moisturizer.
reviews.comments: This comes in a tub.  Which is nice and makes it easy to get the product.  It is very moisturizing and is a reasonable price.

reviews.headline: Soft and Smooth
reviews.comments: I used this hand cream for years.  I purchased it from Ulta because they were the only store that sold this hard to find size.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I like using this on my back. It doesn't cause breakouts and keeps my skin looking and feeling good!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I purchased this originally thinking it was a facial moisturizer. When I realized that wasn't the case, I was worried to put it on my face because I have oily, acne prone skin and didn't want to exacerbate the condition. However, I applied it anyway and was pleasantly surprised how much my skin improved. My skin has become less textured, my breakouts have decreased, and the redness has significantly subsided. I also find that my skin is less oily than it was when I was using a gel moisturizer marketed for oily skin. 

This Cerave container is also very large when used only on the face, so I suspect I'll have this for over 6 months when used once a day. I have used dozens of facial moisturizers over the years (gel, lotion, acne-fighting, thick cream, etc.) and this was has beat them all, including my previous high-end Korean brand. I will definitely repurchase this when I run out.

**Small suggestion: I recommend you purchase the Moisturizing Cream that comes with the pump. I find half a pump to be more than enough for my whole face. The pump stops me from accidentally using too much product, plus it's more hygienic this way.
faceoff_positive.headline: A Mistake Turned Holy Grail

faceoff_negative.comments: I used to really be a fan of this brand, but ever since L'Oreal bought their company, they water down their hero product. I have old jars that list all the good ingredient like their ceramides, cholesterol, and hyaluronic acid above petrolatum. Now, they're listed below potassium phosphate, which is just an ingredient to adjust pH, so basically there's next to none of the good stuff now for the same price. Now the hyaluronic acid is so low that it doesn't even do anything, it's just there for their marketing. Such a disappointing change, DO NOT BUY.
faceoff_negative.headline: New Formula is watered down
